name: Void Transference
ability: ACTION: Place this card near the game board; the number of non-fighter ships you can have in systems is not limited by the number of command tokens in your fleet pool during this game round. At the end of that game round, purge this card.

name: Brood Swarm
ability: After you move ships into the active system: You may skip directly to the "Commit Ground Forces" step. If you do, after you commit ground forces to land on planets, purge this card and return each of your ships in the active system to your reinforcements.

name: Changing the Ways
ability: ACTION: Swap the positions of any 2 systems that contain wormholes or your units, other than the Creuss system, Ahk Creuxx system, or the wormhole nexus. Then, purge this card.

name: Blessing of the Yin
ability: ACTION: Commit up to 3 infantry from your reinforcements to any non-home planets and resolve ground combats on those planets. Players cannot use SPACE CANNON against these units. Then, purge this card.

name: The Winds of Change
ability: ACTION: Reveal cards from the action card deck until you reveal 3 action cards that have component actions. Draw those cards and shuffle the rest back into the action card deck. Then, purge this card.

name: Opening the Eye
ability: ACTION: Place 1 frontier token in each system that does not contain any planets and does not already have a frontier token. Then, explore each frontier token that is in a system that contains 1 or more of your ships. Then, purge this card.

name: Extortion
ability: ACTION: Each other player shows you 1 action card from their hand. For each player, you may either take that card or force that player to discard 3 random action cards from their hand. Then, purge this card.

name: Brilliance of the Hylar
ability: ACTION: Draw 1 genome, 1 unit upgrade, and 1 ability. Then, purge this card.

name: Awakening
ability: ACTION: Ready a planet you control and attach this card to it. Its resource and influence values are each increased by 3, and it gains the SPACE CANNON 5(x3) ability as if it were a unit.

name: Event Horizon
ability: ACTION: Each other player rolls a die for each of their non-fighter ships that are in or adjacent to a system that contains a dimensional tear. on a 1-5, return that unit to their reinforcements. Then, purge this card.

name: Gravitational Collapse
ability: After you move a war sun into a non-home system other than Mecatol Rex: You may destroy all other players' units in that system and replace that system tile with the Muaat supernova tile. If you do, purge this card and each planet card that corresponds to the replaced system tile.

name: Diaspora
ability: ACTION: Choose 1 system that does not contain other players' ships; you may move your flagship and any number of your dreadnoughts from other systems into the chosen system. Then, purge this card.

name: Voice of Council
ability: ACTION: Reveal 3 edicts; choose 1 to resolve and shuffle the rest back into the edict deck. Then, purge this card.

name: Witching Hour
ability: ACTION: Choose a player other than the current speaker to gain the speaker token. Choose a player other than the tyrant to gain the benediction token. Then, purge this card.

name: Flock Migration
ability: ACTION: Move any number of your ships from any systems to any number of other systems that contain 1 of your command tokens and no other players' ships. Then, purge this card.

name: Eternity's End
ability: ACTION: Search the abilty, unit upgrade, or genome deck for any card and gain it. Then, purge this card.

name: Overgrowth
ability: ACTION: Produce any number of units in any number of systems that contain 1 or more of your ground forces. Then, purge this card.

name: The Laws Unwritten
ability: ACTION: Purge an ability owned by any player. Then, purge this card.
